entry.title: Russia Hits Ukraine's Kyiv Region With Drone Attack
entry.content: Moscow carried out a drone attack in the Kyiv region and Ukraine said it shot down several aerial vehicles in the south, following days of strikes that have galvanized Western support for fortifying Ukraine’s air defenses.

entry.title: How Ukrainian Strategy Is Running Circles Around Russia's Lumbering Military
entry.content: Classic military operations and nimble battlefield decision-making are exploiting the incompetence and top-down command of Russian forces. “Without high mobility, we wouldn’t have been able to outplay Russians.”
